Goal Representation:
Reset goals: The sub-goals are: 
['1. Wash the shirt.', '2. Iron the shirt.']

behavior wash_shirt(shirt: item, sink: item):
    body:
        achieve inside(shirt, sink)
        # Ensure the shirt is placed inside the sink

        bind faucet: item where:
            is_faucet(faucet) and close(faucet, sink)
        achieve_once is_on(faucet)
        # If there is a faucet next to the sink, turn it on to wash

        wash(shirt) # Wash the shirt with the faucet on

        achieve_once is_off(faucet)
        # After washing, turn off the faucet

        achieve clean(shirt)
        # Ensure the shirt is clean after washing

behavior __goal__():
    body:
        bind shirt: item where:
            is_clothes_shirt(shirt) and dirty(shirt)
        # Select the dirty shirt to be washed

        bind sink: item where:
            is_sink(sink)
        # Select a sink for washing the shirt

        wash_shirt(shirt, sink)

Reset goals: The sub-goals are: 
['1. Wash the shirt.', '2. Iron the shirt.']

behavior clean_shirt(shirt:item, washing_machine:item):
    body:
        achieve inside(shirt, washing_machine)
        # Place the shirt inside the washing machine
        achieve closed(washing_machine)
        # Close the washing machine door
        achieve is_on(washing_machine)
        # Turn on the washing machine to start washing the shirt

behavior __goal__():
    body:
        bind shirt: item where:
            is_clothes_shirt(shirt) and dirty(shirt)
        # Select the dirty shirt
        bind washing_machine: item where:
            is_washing_machine(washing_machine)
        # Select a washing machine
        clean_shirt(shirt, washing_machine)

Reset goals: The sub-goals are: 
['1. Wash the shirt.', '2. Dry the shirt.', '3. Iron the shirt.']

behavior clean_shirt(shirt:item, sink:item):
    body:
        if is_clothes_shirt(shirt):
            achieve dirty(shirt)
            achieve inside(shirt, sink)
            wash(shirt)
            achieve clean(shirt)

behavior __goal__():
    body:
        bind shirt: item where:
            is_clothes_shirt(shirt)
        # Select a shirt to clean

        bind sink: item where:
            is_sink(sink)
        # Select a sink to wash the shirt

        clean_shirt(shirt, sink)

Reset goals: The sub-goals are:

e.']

behavior wash_shirt(shirt:item):
    body:
        achieve clean(shirt)

behavior __goal__():
    body:
        bind shirt: item where:
            is_clothes_shirt(shirt)
        wash_shirt(shirt)
